t: Matthew 18
Who Is the Greatest?
At*p that time the disciples came to Jesus, saying, “Who then is greatest in the kingdom of heaven?”
Then*p Jesus called a little child to Him, set him in the midst of them,
and said, “Assuredly,*r I*r say*r to*r you,*r unless*r you*r are*r converted*r and*r become*r as*r little*r children,*r you*r will*r by*r no*r means*r enter*r the*r kingdom*r of*r heaven.*r

The Parable of the Unforgiving Servant
